name: Dylan Morrow - Final Build - Protocol 57
description:
You must collect all 10 Keys throughout the distorted Processing Lab and deliver them to the Disease Control, room located in the middle of the of the Lab, in order to unlock The Cure. Make sure to avoid The Infected if you want to survive. You use the Keys you found in order to traverse through the rooms. 

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look Around

F to Interact
